attributes.action: Go ahead with road pricing and think about the effect of transport on the enviroment.Climate Change is having such an influence on our lives and will have.We need to look at the bigger picture.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel very strongly that road pricing is an effective way of getting traffic off the roads.There has to be better and cleaner public transport but we need to stop looking at our own problems and think of how our behaviour will effect people in years to come.Something needs to be done now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
